languages.text: "Тогда надеюсь, что вы хотя бы позабавились. Удачи, Лорд-капитан".
"In that case, I hope that you at least had some fun. Good luck, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Тогда надеюсь, что вы хотя бы позабавились. Удачи, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "In this case, I hope you at least had fun. Good luck, Lord Captain."

languages.text: «En ese caso, espero que al menos se haya divertido un poco. Buena suerte, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "In that case, I hope that you at least had some fun. Good luck, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «En ese caso, espero que al menos se haya divertido un poco. Buena suerte, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「そうであれば、楽しんでください。幸運を祈ります、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "In that case, I hope that you at least had some fun. Good luck, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「そうであれば、楽しんでください。幸運を祈ります、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: “既然如此，希望您至少玩得开心。祝您好运，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "In that case, I hope that you at least had some fun. Good luck, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “既然如此，希望您至少玩得开心。祝您好运，舰长大人。”

languages.text: "In dem Fall hoffe ich, dass Ihr zumindest ein wenig Spaß hattet. Viel Glück, Lord Captain!"
languages.original_text: "In that case, I hope that you at least had some fun. Good luck, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "In dem Fall hoffe ich, dass Ihr zumindest ein wenig Spaß hattet. Viel Glück, Lord Captain!"

languages.text: « Dans ce cas, j'espère au moins que vous avez passé un bon moment. Bonne chance, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "In that case, I hope that you at least had some fun. Good luck, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Dans ce cas, j'espère au moins que vous avez passé un bon moment. Bonne chance, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: "O hâlde en azından biraz eğlendiğinizi umuyorum. İyi şanslar Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "In that case, I hope that you at least had some fun. Good luck, Lord Captain."
